segments.text: Hey Mike . I forgot about registration . I'm a day late , so all the classes are mostly full . What do you think I should do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're screwed . You can't do anything about that . You have to hope that you get some classes that will be useful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think going to the registration building will help at all ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . They will tell you the same thing in a worse way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . Registering for classes is not something you want to miss .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What classes do you think are still open ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I know psychology 101 is a big class , so there will always be seats in that class . You can also get into Sociology .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's helpful . Thanks . But what do you think about philosophy . I wanted to take that class this semester .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I took that class last year . The professor is really cool , so if you go to his office , you can have him sign a card that will let you in even if the class is full .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess that's because so many people drop out of that class .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That makes sense . I think I'll do that . Thanks for all the help .
segments.speaker: S1
